name: Mulan
overview: Mulan is a game for the Sega Mega Drive based on the Disney film of the same name. It was likely developed by ex-Chuanpu developers and published by X Boy. A second release exists that does not credit X Boy but it is unknown if it was published by another company or by X Boy without their logo. In this action platformer game, the player takes control of the titular character, Mulan, through four levels (with usually more then one sub-stage) in a recreation of the film's plot with each level, save for the third, having a boss to defeat once the player reaches the end of the stage.
